## InterfaceTypeSchema interface

TypeScript `interface`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface InterfaceTypeSchema 
```

## Remarks

See: [https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/2/everyday-types.html\#interfaces](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/2/everyday-types.html#interfaces)

## Example


```ts
interface AAA {
    a: string,
    b?: number[],
    c: {
        value: boolean
    }
}

// Index Signature
interface BBB {
    [key: string]: string;
}

```

|  [indexSignature?](./tsbuffer-schema.interfacetypeschema.indexsignature.md) | { keyType: 'String' \| 'Number'; type: [TSBufferSchema](./tsbuffer-schema.tsbufferschema.md)<!-- -->; } | <i>(Optional)</i> Index Signature <code>undefined</code> represents no index signature, i.e. excess property is not allowed. { \[key: string\]: xxx } |
